body.name: WOODBRIDGE Modern Square Design One Piece Dual Flush 1.28 GP Toilet, Chair Height with Soft Closing Seat,T-0020, White

features: [CHAIR HEIGHT DESIGN]:WOODBRIDGEE chair height toilet not only meets ADA standards, must have a 17-19" floor to bowl rim height with seat included, but also offer more comfort to taller people and people who have a hard time getting up from a low seat.

[EASY TO CLEAN]:With a completely smooth, easy to wipe down surface. With our fully concealed trap-way, there are no bends or corners to gather dust. Also, no large mounting holes or ugly plastic caps to be seen.
[QUITE & POWERFUL FLUSHING]:Siphon Flushing one piece toilet, Fully glazed flush system , bringing a super quiet and powerful flushing - NO clogs, NO leaks, and NO problem
[TOP QUALITY SEAT]:High end Soft Closing Toilet Seat with Stainless Steel Durable Seat Hinge, Easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean after years of use.
[LUXURIOUS MODERN DESIGN]:Luxurious Modern Design one piece toilet , Clean, sleek look and compliment with different styles like modern , craftsman , traditional and etc.

[All-In-ONE PACKAGE]:Package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat & water fitting, high quality wax ring, floor bolts, and installation instruction, also Include special hand wrench tool to easily tighten the bolts in narrow spaces.

[CERTIFICATIONS]:Meets US UPC & Canada CSA standard product, High-efficiency, WaterSense Certified toilet - meet or exceed ANSI Z124.1 & ANSI A112-19.7;Products approved and meet the Massachusetts Plumbing & Gas Code.

Available in a full collections of toilets . Frequency buy with Woodbridge Bidet. Easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean after years of use. Never Loosen Toilet seat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the easier skirted toilets to install
reviews.reviewText: I'm in construction, bought these for a job i'm doing, the owner likes skirted toilets as they have the flat sides, giving them less surfaces for dirt, dust and "other" to accumulate. And making it quite easy to clean.Anyone that has installed skirted toilets know they tend to be a pain, with you laying down and trying to squeeze your hand in a small hole in the back of the toilet to use a small tool or wrench to tighten down the flange nuts. The space is so tight even with a ratcheting wrench it can take quite some time.These toilets have a unique setup, they actually have 2 plastic arm like pieces that attach to the flange, then you set the toilet and run a screw in the side of the toilet into those arms, then pop on the caps that cover the screws. IT was certainly a lot better than the normal skirted toilets.The square design is unique and i like that. Seems roomy, almost like the double wide recliners vs a regular.My only concern is that in 5 years when they want to replace the seat, is the company still going to make the seat for it, will they be able to find a seat since it is unique. I do not think a regular seat would fit this.While this is the first time i used this specific toilet, i have used 4 other skirted toilets made by the same company, and while i all have been purchased roughly in the last 2 years, i have had no issues reported.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife loves it
reviews.reviewText: The only problem - since this was a replacement for our old toilet - was the water feed. It was too close and was inside the toilet's exterior. I need to redo the water shut off valve so that I can shut the water off if it is necessary. But this is not a fault of the toilet. The first thing noticed was how modern it looks with a very easy to clean exterior. The choice of flush is saving us a lot of water. The flush and the water refill are extremely quiet. For those remodeling their bathroom, especially in a water poor area, this toilet is the correct choice. It has impressed everyone that has seen it (or tried it).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great unique toilet
reviews.reviewText: This is a great and one of a kind toilet. It was easy to install and it is designed to hide the plumbing and look very clean. It is a solid design and works well. Even though it is rectangle shaped it is comfortable and quiet. It's easy to keep it clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very modern and easy to clean!
reviews.reviewText: This toilet is very modern and easy to clean. Make sure that you show your contractor the toilet before they do the tiling or piping because the toilet goes completely flush against the wall. It looks amazing and is very elongated. I was scared that I was not going to be able to find parts in the future if it breaks however, the company that makes it is in California. Over all I am super happy with this toilet!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent toilet with quiet operation
reviews.reviewText: This toilet is everything I thought it would be and then some. It is aesthetically pleasing, an excellent fit for my rectangular powder room, a great complement to other pieces in the bathroom, and most of all, operates quietly even when using the double flush function of the dual flush option. My only criticism is that it took three plumbers to install it. The first plumber told me straight up he could not install it. The second plumber started to install it and then told me he needed the expertise of another plumber. Together both of them installed it. The installation cost nearly twice as much as the toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I got this toilet for my daughter bathroom. She loves it.Looks so nice,beautiful design and comfortable. My husband is plumber.He said is very good quality toilet.So...we ordered another 2 for master bedroom and powder bathroom. Very good price and the quality is like 1200$ worth it toilet. Belive me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Caution with service line placement
reviews.reviewText: Had to move supply line so it is more than 4.5 inches from center of toilet by tearing out wall behind and installing new supply line. Took two plumbers to install due to moving supply line and very heavy. Cannot access supply line or turn off valve if within confines of toilet back. Looks great in pictures but not so much in small bathroom. Easy to clean. Nice Euro look. Not accessible height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am extremely happy with the high quality of Woodbridge toilets
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely happy with the high quality of Woodbridge toilets. I've bought 3 T-0019 and 2 T-0020. They both are wonderful. I also want to give my best compliments to their customer service. I reported to them that one of the soft closing seat came with a small crack, but I did not report the damage to Amazon because it was just a tiny one. After a couple of months the crack expanded and I contact them to find out where I could buy a new seat. They prompt respond me and for my surprise the sent a brand new seat at no cost. Thank you so much!!
